body.p: This element is used to create a list of listitems (template.XULElem("richlistitem")s), similar to a template.XULElem("listbox"), but is designed to be used when the items do not contain simple text content.

p.span: template.Note("In versions of Firefox prior to Firefox 3, rich list boxes support only single selection. Firefox 3 introduced multiple selection to rich list boxes.")
